document.bingtitle: 1111 Stories is seeing 11:11 more than coincidence?
document.webtitle: 1111 Stories is seeing 11:11 more than coincidence?1111Stories.com
document.description: I opened the printer up and I was able to clear ... use the search feature to find a Burger King fast food restaurant. ... smoke (no flames) I reach in pull out the tray ...
document.body:
My 1111 stories are posted below
Scroll Down for New Post: 01/31/2012
Some Music to help you relax:
Calypso Memories-Healing Music by Marcome
Canadian Singer Songwriter Marcome
This 8 Year Old Girl Singer is Amazing
For several years I have been seeing the number sequence 1111. I always wondered if it was a coincidence or something more. Finally, the amount of times that the events occurred, made me believe that it was more than chance. So I started searching the web and found I was not alone. There were hundreds if not thousands of people experiencing the same thing. What is this 1111 phenomenon all about.? Some of the explanations went beyond what I was willing to accept. I ultimately settled on and was willing to believe that it could be a way for our Guardian Angels to let us know they were here for us. I have included my experiences below. We can consider seeing these 1111 events as a 1111 prompt from our Angel friends. I also believe these experiences can help us grow spiritually, because they make us stop and question what these prompts could mean to us. You can also go to my favorite 11:11 Message Board site and meet others that are experiencing the same 1111 prompts. This 11:11 message board has some great people I've known some for 5 years now. My thread at the site is Traveling with 1111
Angels are all around us, all the time, in the very air we breathe. ~Quoted in The Angels' Little Instruction Book by Eileen Elias Freeman, 1994
Bible Gateway has a tool for reading and researching scripture online -- all in the language or translation of your choice! It provides advanced searching capabilities, which allow readers to find and compare particular passages in scripture based on keywords, phrases, or scripture reference. This is a great way to increase your Spiritual growth in the word. Lookup a word or passage in the Bible
Include this form on your page

New: Reader Post -Malicious code needs to be removed before reader posts can be added again.
MY 11:11 STORIES BELOW
New Post below for 1/31/2012 I can't believe how fast a year went. I almost didn't make it to my 62nd birthday. Many of you know that I almost died last year, so I thank God for each day. Most of my time this year was spent trying to find an Internet opportunity that would allow me to retire early. I think I found it.
"Let the Spirit be your guide" Having code issues trying to repair! Past stories will be added one by one. Thanks for your patience.
New Post 1/31/2012 My daughter and I stopped at McDonalds and we used the drive thru. Our Drive thru shows your order on a board by the window, so we heard the amount and saw the $11.11 total price. I chuckled and turned to my daughter and she was smiling as well. She knows about my 1111 interest.
Post from 01/23/2011 Hi everyone ,
I got a good laugh from this prompt today. Sometime in September I had used my cellphone to take the picture and then emailed it to myself. When I found it today I couldn't remember where I had been when I took the picture. So I used Google search for the telephone number you see and it gave me a link to a youtube video. It was a pizza commerical from 1985 and it was from Toronto Canada. I guess it must be pretty good pizza since it's still there.
What made this prompt interesting (You all know those are my favorites ) was the fact the driver had to go down this street because the other main street was blocked by fire department activity. If it wasn't for that activity I would have missed the prompt.
Hope you get a laugh from the video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVe2YDOzHD0
Nick "Let the Spirit be your guide" Posted 02/19/2010
When I got to Louisiana I was trying to decide if I was going to take a shuttle service or a cab. So I was standing at the cab stand for about 10 minutes and that whole time I see white cabs coming and going.
I then walk to the shuttle area and no shuttle was there and the dispatcher said it would be another 15 minutes so I returned to the cab stand and the second cab in line was
Now that was cool and I did wait a few minutes but no one came to get the first cab, so I did finally go to the first cab in line. So for the 20 to 30 minutes I was there I did not see another blue cab or a cab with that phone number. This would qualify for the timing prompt since I did not take a cab right away and I decided not to wait for the shuttle and came back to the cab stand and was able to experience my favorite prompt.
Thought I was done didn't you!
I ended up at the Horseshoe casino hotel and not till I got home
and started filling out my expense report did I see at the bottom of the bill the zip code for the hotel ...
Okay that's it for now. Yes I usually see many more 1111 prompts but I keep the special ones for here. Hope everyone had a great weekend.
Posted 01/31/2010
I'm back
I had spent the night at the Hyatt Regency right at the Pittsburgh airport. You just take a covered walkway right to the hotel. So I obviously did not know or need the address. I almost missed the prompt, except I did get the urge to write down the information from the phone card shown above. When I saw the 1111 I had to laugh. .
I almost got a cab to the Marriott that was close by because I have a reward card with them, but I kept getting the nudge to go to the hotel right at the airport. Glad I did.
Posted 01/31/2010 Hi everyone
Now the next 1111 prompt comes as I'm leaving Philadelphia about 2 hours later then I had planned on . Obviously this was not in the plans of our friends. Yes, this is one of those exact timing prompts. As I entered the main highway leaving Philadelphia at that exact moment the cab in the photo comes along side of me and then pulls ahead and pulls in front of me so he can exit the highway 2 minutes later. Pretty obvious that any further delay in my trip or even if I had left earlier I would have missed this prompt. Now we could always say it would have occurred no matter what time I left.
Love and peace Nick
Posted 01/26/2010 I had a great prompt occur on my trip down to Maryland. The trip for me takes about 4 hours by car.
I was entering a major highway and as I merged with traffic, I noticed the van next to me had 1111 as the last 4 digits of the business phone. He was going a lot faster then me and I only had about 5 to 10 seconds to notice the numbers. I like the timing of merging right next to him. If I had been 10 seconds slower I would have missed the prompt.
I thought last year was hectic with all the traveling but I think this year is even more crazy. Posted 11/26/2009
I guess I'll start with a trip I took to NYC (I've been to Canada, Louisiana, Virginia, Chicago, and Texas since the last time I was here) The New York trip is an example of where the timing had to be exact for me to see my 1111 prompt.
I had finished working in the elevator motor room and had just returned to the street level and said goodbye to the elevator mechanic who had worked with me. He had offered me a ride to the bus station but I knew he had a long trip home so I told him I would just walk the two blocks to the Subway. (Turned into 6 blocks because I went the wrong direction ) So if I would have gone with him I would have missed the prompt.
After walking 2 blocks I realized my mistake and walked back to the building, but instead of going straight I made a turn to walk 1 block south and then west to the subway station. As I walked up to the intersection the light changed, allowing the cars to cross in front of me. The second car that passed was a Car service and they had their telephone number on the door. Yup, the last 4 numbers were 1111.
It happened so fast I couldn't have taken a picture even if I wanted to. Talk about timing.
Hope everyone that celebrated Thanksgiving had one great day. Hope everyone else had a great day as well.
Peace and Love Nick
Posted 7/16/2009 Well after traveling to the mail box my wife started opening the mail on the drive back to our house. When we got back in our driveway she opened the last letter and it had a check and she chuckled and said look at the check number. This morning my 7 year old granddaughter was playing in our front yard and right after she came into the house we looked out the bay window in our living room we see a Black Bear in the exact spot she had been playing in. We live in the Pocono mountains of Pennsylvania so not that strange an event. Great incentive for a quick prayer of thanksgiving.
Posted 6/27/2009 Hi everyone, Well one week of vacation is gone. One more week to go.Went to the supermarket with my wife and we were almost finished and she remembered one more item. So I stayed with the shopping cart while she went back a few isles to get one more thing. While I'm standing with the cart I decide to pick up the bag of Dried Apricots and turn it over to read the Nutrition Facts. (7 Apricots 120 calories) then I looked down at the bottom area of the bag and...surprise I see...
